info.title: Alchemy Microformats Parsing API
info.description: AlchemyAPI understands Microformats data standards and is capable of extracting hCard, adr, geo, and rel-* formatted content from any web page. Leverage this structured data to enhance web page categorization and indexing, and perform content discovery tasks.
